description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Test your geographical skills with Globe Clicker, a full 3D experience of Planet Earth! Rotate and zoom to point at the given location. Points are awarded for accuracy and speed. Try the challenge mode to be the first in the scoreboards, or play only with a restricted list : World Capitals, USA, Europe, World Heritage Sites, ...
description.short: Test your geographical skills with Globe Clicker, a full 3D experience of Planet Earth! Rotate and zoom to point at the given location. Points are awarded for accuracy and speed. Try the challenge mode to be the first in the scoreboards, or play only with a restricted list : World Capitals, USA, Europe, World Heritage Sites, ...
